attributes.action: Regulate the use of automatic air fresheners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Automatic air fresheners such as those used in company washrooms should be properly regulated in the same way as cigarette smoke.

Many such fresheners often emit a concentrated cloud of VOCs into a confined and poorly ventilated space.  At best the effects are irritating and at worst represent a very real health risk.  Some cans found in these devices even have helpful advice such as 'do not breath' and 'solvent abuse can kill instantly'.
